trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile
trans-unit.target: Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile

trans-unit.source: Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile
trans-unit.target: Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Verifies the keys and values in a session configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 验证会话配置文件中的键和值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** cmdlet verifies that a session configuration file contains valid keys and the values are of the correct type.
trans-unit.target: **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** cmdlet 验证会话配置文件包含有效的键和值都是正确的类型。

trans-unit.source: For enumerated values, the cmdlet verifies that the specified values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 对于枚举值，该 cmdlet 将验证指定的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** returns "True" ($true) if the file passes all tests and "False" ($false) if it does not.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** 如果文件通过所有测试和"False"($false)，如果不是返回"True"($true)。

trans-unit.source: To find any errors, use the **Verbose** common parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找任何错误，请使用 **Verbose** 通用参数。

trans-unit.source: **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** verifies the session configuration files, such as those created by the New-PSSessionConfigurationFile cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** 验证会话配置文件，例如那些通过 New-pssessionconfigurationfile cmdlet 创建的。

trans-unit.source: For information about session configurations, see about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152).
trans-unit.target: 有关会话配置的信息，请参阅 about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152)。

trans-unit.source: For information about session configuration files, see about_Session_Configuration_Files (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=236023).
trans-unit.target: 有关会话配置文件的信息，请参阅 about_Session_Configuration_Files (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=236023)。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Test a session configuration file
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 测试会话配置文件

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** cmdlet to test a new session configuration file before using it in a session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** cmdlet 可在会话配置中使用它之前测试新的会话配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Test the session configuration file of a session configuration
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 测试会话配置的会话配置文件

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** cmdlet to test the session configuration file that is being used to in the Restricted session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** cmdlet 来在 Restricted 的会话配置中测试到正在使用会话配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **Path** parameter is a Get-PSSessionConfiguration command that gets the Restricted session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 值 **路径** 参数是一个可获取 Restricted 的会话配置的 Get-pssessionconfiguration 命令。

trans-unit.source: The path to the session configuration file is stored in the value of the **ConfigFilePath** property of the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 会话配置文件的路径存储的值中 **ConfigFilePath** 会话配置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Test all session configuration files
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 测试所有会话配置文件

trans-unit.source: This function tests all session configuration files that are used in all session configurations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将测试在本地计算机上的所有会话配置中使用的所有会话配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The function uses the Get-PSSessionConfiguration cmdlet to get all session configurations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用 Get-pssessionconfiguration cmdlet 来获取本地计算机上的所有会话配置。

trans-unit.source: The command pipes the session configuration to the ForEach-Object cmdlet, which runs a command on each of the session configurations.
trans-unit.target: 该命令通过管道传递给 Foreach-object cmdlet，后者在每个会话配置上运行命令的会话配置。

trans-unit.source: The **ConfigFilePath** property of a session configuration contains the path to the session configuration file that is used in the session configuration, if any.
trans-unit.target: **ConfigFilePath** 会话配置的属性包含在会话配置中，使用会话配置文件的路径，如果有的话。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the **ConfigFilePath** property is populated (is true), the command gets (prints) the **ConfigFilePath** property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **ConfigFilePath** 填充属性 （为 true），该命令将获取 （打印） **ConfigFilePath** 属性值。

trans-unit.source: Then it uses the **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile** cmdlet to test the file in the **ConfigFilePath** value.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用 **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile** cmdlet 来测试中的文件 **ConfigFilePath** 值。

trans-unit.source: The **Verbose** parameter returns the file error when the file fails the test.
trans-unit.target: **Verbose** 参数在该文件，则测试失败时，它返回文件错误。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path and file name of a session configuration file (.pssc).
trans-unit.target: 指定会话配置文件 (.pssc) 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the path, the default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略路径，则默认路径为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are supported, but they must resolve to a single file.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符，但它们必须解析为单个文件。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a session configuration file path to **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道将会话配置文件路径为 **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile**。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a session configuration file path to **Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递的会话配置文件路径 **Test-pssessionconfigurationfile**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Boolean
trans-unit.target: System.Boolean

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
